explanation: The majority of actionable opinions around BTC reflect mixed to negative short-term sentiment, with several participants mentioning imminent or ongoing selling pressure, large resistance walls above, and expectations of a short or a lower low before any larger bullish moves. Some call out selling if certain red candlesticks close, and there are explicit short entries noted around 107800-108000 with targets below current levels. Despite a few bullish long-term projections (ATH in months), the 1-minute candlestick and very short-term sentiment is swayed toward shorting or caution, especially with commentors observing absorption by limit sellers, large supply walls, and warnings of a dump. There are also several neutral or uncertain/sideways remarks, but the negative/short-side opinions outnumber aggressive calls to buy right now.
